modules.name: fin_500_investments
recommendedLiterature: Brealey, Myers, Allen, Corporate Finance, (McGraw-Hill, 10th edition, 2010)
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Basic knowledge in mathematics (optimization, elementary matrix algebra) and statistics (expected value, variances, covariances, correlation, t-tests). Successful attendance of Finanzwirtschaft I & II in the Mannheim Bachelor's program or similar courses.

modules.additionalPrerequisite: Every student participating in this course should have completed the equivalent of the 2-semester finance module, which is part of the Mannheim Bachelor program. Basic knowledge in accounting, finance, mathematics, and statistics is assumed.
